S.FORM: Bulgaria hya' ga cyux maki' tay 43 00 N, 25 00 E na Oco syuw. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 110,879 sq km (maki' tay 105ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 108,489 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilung hya' ga 2,390 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' squliq hya' ga 7,144,653. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahun hya' ga 46.90 , lhlahuy hya' ga 36.70 , sni' naha' sa pptzyuwaw sa bzinah hya' ga 16.40 . spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' krahu' qalang hya' ga Sofia. snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' hya' ga 3 na tay cyugal byacing na qutux kawas. mrhuw Kokka' mrhuw Kokka' ta' misuw hya' ga Rumen Radev, aring ryax 22 squ byacing tay 1 sa kawas 2017 lga, musa' spazyang balay ms'rux kya la.
